name: New Day
description:
New Day was made for the #iluJam dating sim game jam in June 2015. All words, assets, and design were created in the month of June!

Kate did background art and Astrid's route.

Marri did character art and Ken's route.

New Day was built in Twine, using the Love Classic visual novel theme developed by Rebecca Cohen-Palacios for Pixelles.
